productDetails.title: USB-C Power 61W Adapter Charger Replacement for MacBook Pro 13/12/14 Inch, Compatible with MacBook Air/iPad Pro/Type C Laptop
productDetails.subtitle: Included USB-C to USB-C Charger Cable (6.6ft/2m)

aboutThisItem: Input: AC 100-240V, 1.5A, 50-60Hz; Output: 14.5V/2A, 20.3V/3A, 9V/3A, 5.2V/2.4A. Auto-detect devices and provide optimal current
61W USB-C Laptop Charger compatible with MacBook Pro 13 (2016–2022), MacBook Pro 14, MacBook Pro 12 (2015, A1706, A1708, A1707, A1534)
Compatible with MacBook Pro 16/15/13, MacBook Air 13 (2018–2020), iPad Pro 12.9/11 (2018, 2020), iPad Air 10.9 (2020), Type-C laptops & Android phones
Compatible with MacBook Air 13 (A1932, A2179), MacBook 12 (A1534, 2015–2020), and other Type-C laptops
Package includes: 1 × 61W USB-C Power Adapter, 1 × USB-C to USB-C Charging Cable
